mapper.select: SELECT replyId, replyName, replyContent, replyInserted, contentId FROM Reply ORDER BY replyId DESC
SELECT replyId, replyName, replyContent, replyInserted, replyMainText FROM Reply WHERE replyId = #{replyId} AND replyName = #{replyName}
SELECT replyId, replyName, replyContent, replyInserted, replyMainText FROM Reply WHERE replyId = #{replyId}
SELECT replyId, replyName, replyContent, replyInserted, replyMainText, contentId FROM Reply WHERE contentId = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply ( replyName, replyContent, replyInserted ) VALUES ( #{replyName}, #{replyContent}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE Reply SET replyContent = #{replyContent}, replyMainText = #{replyMainText} WHERE replyId = #{replyId}
